item.title: Preview of Pixel Shaders
item.description: Note: This process is specific to the preview of my shader support feature. It is none-breaking if you’re already using pixel. This post will walk you through the process of getting the Pixel game development library and it’s dependencies working correctly. Particularly on Windows this was a hard barrier to get passed. I want to make that easier for newer Go developers to get started with Pixel. Some of the instructions may be obvious to you.
